title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Developmental Microlearning for Enhancing Doctoral Thesis Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can establish goal-setting and evaluation systems for each stage of thesis writing
All participants can apply self-reflective writing strategies utilizing metacognition
90% of learners can derive examples of thesis improvement through acceptance of peer feedback
All learners complete microlearning modules in 15-minute increments in mobile environments at over 90%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
